page.title: 13ECOLOGY IN WOODLAND
page.content: The village is{352m above sea level. We get a lot of{wind and heavy snow {storms}in winter. There is not much{pollution}in Woodland except for the chemicals that the farmers spray on their fields.It can pollute streams and break the food chain. At our school we are carrying out a {conservation}programme.We plant trees and have made a pond and are allowing part of the garden to grow wild. We try to attract insects to it by planting a variety of shrubs and flowers. My Mam plants cowslips and trees in our garden and field. { Animals}I have seen in Woodland are bat,mouse,stoat,weasel,rat,mole,hare, rabbit,hedgehog,vole,frog and toad. { Birds}and{Butterflies}are on page 14.
